4.5 million deaths expected before end of may  Don‚Äôt be a statistic  Stay at Home

US, UK, Germany, Japan and China are the centers of economic activity. Shutting them would cause more damage than the virus itself. Hence they have to keep the airports open. Corona, with a 97%cure rate only overwhelms the hospitals, care givers. Nobody was prepared for this. Eventually we all will get corona sometime, no doubt. Hence keeping the social interactions to a minimum is more important than shutting down the beehives of the world. There wont be any honey!

In Sri Lanka, no proper food supplies, No medicines, lengthy ques and waiting lists and many other issues due to corona prevention; Even Italy they have supermarkets open Interestingly, corona cases also increases; Big economic wave to come towards survivors
